description.it: Posso sviluppare pagine web come questa, usando HTML, CSS, JavaScript e React.
description.en: I can develop web pages like this, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.
description.es: Puedo desarrollar páginas web como esta utilizando HTML, CSS, JavaScript y React.

description.it: Posso sviluppare applicazioni con Java, Python e C#.
description.en: I can develop applications using Java, Python and C#.
description.es: Puedo desarrollar aplicaciones utilizando Java, Python y C#.

description.it: Posso creare report raccogliendo dati ed elaborandoli con SQL, Excel, PowerBI e Looker Studio.
description.en: I can create reports by collecting and analyzing data using SQL, Excel, PowerBI, and Looker Studio.
description.es: Puedo crear informes recopilando y analizando datos utilizando SQL, Excel, PowerBI y Looker Studio.

description.it: Posso progettare grafiche e crearle con Photoshop.
description.en: I can design graphics and create them with Photoshop.
description.es: Puedo diseñar diseños gráficos y crearlos con Photoshop.
